Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador will face Argentina on Thursday, July 4 at 20:00 in the quarterfinals of the Copa América 2024 at NRG Stadium in Houston.
Ecuador seeks to advance to the semifinals after an irregular campaign, aiming for their second victory in the tournament after defeating Jamaica.
Ecuador's coach, Félix Sánchez Bas, considers making changes in the system, possibly adding a midfielder and having Enner Valencia as the sole attacker.
